titles.title: I lift my voice in song unto Thy name,

authors.author: Paul Charter: Â© 1975 Living Way Ministries

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lift my voice in song unto Thy name,
I lift my hands, You're every day the same;
Come fill me now, Lord Jesus, let it be,
Let now my lips sing new found praise to Thee.
Singing hallelujah, hallelujah,
Praise and worship to Thy name;
Singing hallelujah, hallelujah,
Praise and worship to Thy name.
